items.title: Mind Schedule
items.description: Administrative panel where professionals register businesses, configure schedules, define services, and set prices. Integrates authentication via Clerk, AI suggestions, and deployment on Vercel.

items.title: Dynamic Form Builder
items.description: Application for creating and responding to dynamic forms with conditional questions, multiple response types, and a preview panel. 100% responsive.

items.title: Checkout Cakto
items.description: Mini-checkout simulating the actual flow of purchasing a digital course. Mobile-first UX, robust validations, fee calculation, smart installment plans, and PIX highlighting.

items.title: Widget iFrame Bonifiq
items.description: Widget embeddable via external script that displays user data and posts via API. PostMessage between parent and iframe, skeleton loaders, and testing with Vitest.

items.title: My Portfolio
items.description: Responsive personal portfolio with modern design, smooth animations, and focus on accessibility. A technical and visual showcase for recruiters and networking.

items.title: Football League Tables
items.description: Page to select football leagues from around the world and view rounds of all teams or individually, consuming the football-data.org API.

items.title: GoBarber
items.description: Complete scheduling platform for barbershops with backend in Node.js (TDD, Clean Architecture, SOLID) and frontend React with Styled Components.
